steps: Set the page layout to landscape.
Add a title to the brochure.
Choose a suitable font and font size for the title.
Format the text and images to make the brochure visually appealing.
Add informative content about the topic of the brochure.
Organize the content into sections using headings.
Include contact information or a call-to-action at the end of the brochure.
Proofread and edit the brochure for any errors.
Save the document with an appropriate file name.
Print the brochure or save it as a PDF for digital distribution.
